Package com.asp.smartbeergreenhouse.activities

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AlarmsActivity
    Alarms Activity Shows the Alarms UI screen The farmer can visualize the active alarms (acknowledged and not acknowledged) retrieved from Thingsboard
    BreweryActivity
    Brewery Activity Shows the Brewery UI screen The brewery can visualize the hops status Also the brewery has two buttons: one for logout and one for checking more information (not implemented already) generated in Thingsboard
    FarmerActivity
    Farmer Activity Shows the Farmer UI screen The farmer can visualize the hops status Also the farmer has two buttons: one for logout and one for checking alarms generated in Thingsboard
    LoginActivity
    Login Activity Shows the login UI screen The user that wants to log in the application needs to fill the following fields: - Username - Password Once the user finished to enter all the fields, the login button will be enabled for the login the user in the app.
    SignUpActivity
    Sign Up Activity.
    WelcomeActivity
    Welcome activity Shows the welcome UI screen.
